"hondayi dan api ada igen ganna yanne pruthuwiya kohomada bhramanaya wemin suryaya wata yanne kiyana ekath apita ra dawal uda wenne kiyana ekath gana" lamo aà·sawen mema nawa padama igena gannata hari bari gasunaha."dan me thama pruthuwiya, meka karakawi karakawi suryayawata yanawa" kiyamin kalu lalle andi rupayak osse pahadili karannata giyada, lamunta eeya notheruna bawa owunge muhunu desa balimen mema palapurudu guru mahathata awabodhawiya.thawaduratath thama sisun apahasuwata path nokara meya pahada dimata thama widuhale aadarsha loka golayak nathi baw dana siti ethuma, galapena golayak gena eemata thawath kalayak waya nokirimata sitha awata balanne, ohuge kannadi kopuwa daka, eya athata gena "dan onna balanna lamayi, me thama pruthuwiya" yanuwen kannadi kopuwa penwa "menna mehema thama wata karaki karaki menna mehema suryaya watath" yanuwen mita molawagath thama atha suriyayata upama karamin "paribhramanaya wenne, ee kiyanne karakenne" yanuwen pawasanawath samanga panthiyata diwa aa koluwek "loku mahaththaya anna amarasiri watila atha kadila" yayi wenath panthiyaka sisuwakuta siduwu anathurak danumdima hethuwen panthiya atharamanga nawatha ee sandaha yamata siduwiya.pasuwa eelanga dina panthiyata pamini gurumahatha "api kothaninda nawaththuwe , hari pruthuwiya bhramanaya wena thanin neda" yanuwen pawasa nawath padama arambaimata sudanamwa "hondayi api aayi balamu kohomada pruthuwi bhramanaya siddha wenne" yanuwen pawasa, edina thama kannadi kopuwa genawith nathi baw daka sudusu yamak soya wata pita balanawita tayimpi oralosuwa daka athata gena padama pera paridima patangaththa pamani, edinada ohu hamuwannata dura bahara sita amuththek pamini baw danwana laduwa "ane lamayine ehenan api heta karamu padama" yanuwen pawasa nawatha atharamanga nathara kota pitawayannata wuni.pasudina udasaninma pamini gurumahatha sisunta porondu wu paridiima padama iwarakeru athara, edina aadarshaya hatiyata dunkola heppuwa gena thibuni.in tika dinakata pasu pasalata pamini pasal parikshaka mahathaku wisin aawaranaya karana lada padam piriksamin panthi atharata yanagamanedi ihatha panthiyatada pamina, mathakadi bhugola widya padama iwarakala bawa sandahanwa thibenu daka lamunge bhugole widya danuma mandak prikshakirimata sitha "hondayi dan oya lamayi igenagena thinawaneda ape pruthuwiya pilibandawa ehema" yanuwen wimasana wita lamo siyalloma eka handin "ehemayi" kiya pilithuru duni.pilithuren uddamayata pathwu mul gurumahatha "ooka me daruwange aasama padmak una sar...lamayinta dan oya gana honda awabhodayak thinawa" yayi pawasuye sangawagath aadambarayakini."ehemada" yanuwen mulguruthuma desa bala pawasu parikshakawaraya nawathath lamun desata hari "hondayi ehenan oya lamayi kiyanna balanna mata pruthuwiye niyama hadaya mona wageda kiyala" yanuwen pawasu wita ekwarama ihala esawunu ath gonna atharin ek lamayakuta parikshakawaraya "aa oya lamaya kiyannako balanna ehenan" yayi pawasiya.ewita thama mul guruthuma tharamma ho eyatath wadi aadambarayakin nangi siti daruwa "pruthuwiya sandudata lokumahaththayage kannadi kopuwa wage, angaruwadata parana orlosuwa wage, badadata bulath heppuwa wage " yayi pawasamin wadi wenawita thama hinawa amaruwen thadakaran eliyata bata parikshakawaraya log pothe guru yuwalage dadi kapawima agayana keti satahanakda dama waha pitawagiya athara, eeta tika dinakata pasu pasalata aluthma aadarsha loka golayak adyapana kanthoruwen ewa thibini.
